source.name: environment for open discussion
source.instructions: **Fill In the Blank** with the most appropriate response.
source.text: ChatGPT API can be used to create a <<<supportive>>> environment for open discussion and evaluation of the generated ideas during a brainstorming session.
source.guidance: The ChatGPT API can be an effective tool for facilitating brainstorming sessions, offering suggestions, and helping developers consider alternative ways of tackling coding challenges.

text: ChatGPT API can be used to create a
environment for open discussion and evaluation of the generated ideas during a brainstorming session.
